title: Migrate executor
description: Apply pending migrations to SurrealDB with dependency resolution

module.description: Target specific module by name (e.g., 'auth'), number (e.g., 10), full directory name (e.g., '010_auth'), or comma-separated list (e.g., '010,020,auth')

filename.description: Target specific migration file by number (e.g., 1), name (e.g., 'auth'), full filename (e.g., '0001_authentication_up.surql'), or comma-separated list (e.g., '1,2,auth')

envFile.description: Path to environment file relative to workspace root

force.description: Force apply migrations even if they appear to be already applied

configPath.description: Path to configuration file (config.json or config.yaml)

dryRun.description: Show what migrations would be applied without executing them

detailed.description: Show detailed migration information including execution details

debug.description: Enable debug logging for troubleshooting (includes detailed output)
